author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OCTAVE STRENGTHENS AND BECOMES THE NINTH HURRICANE OF THE 2025 EAST PACIFIC HURRICANE SEASON...
summary: ...OCTAVE STRENGTHENS AND BECOMES THE NINTH HURRICANE OF THE 2025 EAST PACIFIC HURRICANE SEASON... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sun Oct 05 the center of Octave was located near 15.7, -123.7 with movement NE at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 987 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...OCTAVE STRENGTHENS AND BECOMES THE NINTH HURRICANE OF THE 2025 EAST PACIFIC HURRICANE SEASON... title: Summary - Hurricane Octave (EP5/EP152025)
